entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3148
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Wrap Host with Quote so we can have wildcard domain - PR: #1719
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3153
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Fix externalClickhouse password secret - PR: #1722 - [Snyk] Security upgrade node from 21.2-alpine3.18 to 21.7.3-alpine3.18 - PR: #1723 - [Snyk] Security upgrade node from 22.5 to 22.9 - PR: #1721 - [Snyk] Security upgrade node from 21.2-alpine3.18 to 21.7.3-alpine3.18 - PR: #1710 - Refactor changing secret values from data to stringData - PR: #1725
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3163
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.
